translations: 受人尊敬的妇女（matriarch 的名词复数）

sentences.sentence: His previous three books were explorations of the psychology of a small but prominent group of people with powerful matriarchs and lots and lots of nannies: the British royal family.
sentences.translation: 鉴于他先前的三本著作探讨的是一群小众杰出且有权有势的女家长们的心理状态，那如今这本《天赋异禀：揭密我们行为背后的原因》大概也没什么价值可言。
